name: AIMetricsSummary
title: AI Metrics Summary
description: Summary cards displaying key performance metrics for the selected time period
functionalRequirements:
## Metrics Summary Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display key metrics in card format
- Show total runs, tokens, and costs
- Calculate averages per run
- Display success rate percentage
- Show trend indicators (up/down from previous period)
- Responsive card layout

### Visual Features
- Color-coded metric cards
- Icon indicators for each metric
- Animated number transitions
- Hover effects for additional info

dataRequirements.description: Receives calculated metrics from parent component

technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- metrics: Object with calculated metric values

### Card Layout
- Responsive grid of metric cards
- Each card shows metric name, value, and trend
- Consistent styling with theme

properties.name: metrics
properties.description: Calculated metrics object with totalRuns, totalTokens, totalCost, etc.
